overview: For years, James Gregory has delighted audiences across America with his down-home brand of comedy. Beef Stew for the Brain is a collection of true and nearly-true stories and observations on everything from family life to bad weather, all told in the unique James Gregory style.
tagline: In Beef Stew for the Brain James serves up over an hour of his unique brand of Southern Fried comedy before a sold out crowd at the Renaissance Center in Dickson, Tennessee.
title: Beef Stew for the Brain
